stadium.name: Fletchings Field
stadium.description: Fletchings Field was the first formal Troll Ball stadium in Warden lands. The design balances wood and stone, with arrowhead motifs and banners representing each region under Warden protection. The field includes trees, gully's and other obstacle placements, changed each match by local druids and terrain crafters.

stats.pregame_ritual: Going over the game plan drawn in the dirt with the team captain.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Headbutting their own team's goal post (gently).
Sticking a specific type of feather in their helmet's plume.
Burying their helmet in the ground and then digging it back up.
Reading their own fortune in a scattering of knuckle bones.
Wearing a specific, garishly colored pair of undergarments.
Always putting on their left gauntlet before their right.

stadium.name: The Unruly Yard
stadium.description: A field in the center of the city's most rebellious district. The stadium is covered in graffiti, the crowd is hostile, and riots are a common post-game (and mid-game) event.

stats.pregame_ritual: Drinking a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Testing the heft of their weapon with a series of slow, deliberate swings.
Kissing the Trollball on its stitched 'nose'.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Refusing to step on any lines on the field before the whistle blows.
Telling a terrible joke to the Trollball to 'loosen it up'.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.

preGame: # ‚öæ STEP UP TO THE PLATE, OSTERRA! THE FINAL CURTAIN RISES! ‚öæ  Hello, you beautiful, bloodthirsty bunch! Nok the Corrupter here, your favorite voice from the void, bringing you the series-deciding finale of the Tuesday Night Trollball Grand Finals! We are live at **Fletchings Field**, and the air is thicker than a troll's skull! The series is deadlocked at 2-2! After a grueling Best of 5, it all comes down to this one match! The druids have been busy whispering to the bushes, and the **Shifting Terrain** is already making the end zones look like they're trying to escape! üå≥  I just peeked into the dugouts, and the rituals are in full swing! **Wynnie Faina** and **Normi Glaudia** of Oak & Onslaught are out there with their boots on the wrong feet‚Äîtactical brilliance or a literacy issue? You be the judge! Meanwhile, **Hole Bowerman** is elbow-deep in the dirt, burying her helmet like a metal squirrel! I suppose if you want a sturdy head, you have to let it commune with the roots first! üå∞  But look at those rebels from New Monteforte! The Chaos Creatures aren't here for a picnic! **Lian Denton** just downed a shot of steaming hot gravy from a dented tin cup‚Äînow that‚Äôs a champion‚Äôs fuel! **Boulanger Procto** is meticulously arranging his gear in a perfect spiral. It‚Äôs almost a shame it‚Äôs about to be covered in Warden blood! üåÄ  The **Open Bar** is officially flowing, and the fans are already swaying like the trees! These Oak & Onslaught 'heroes' might be the local darlings, but in the Yard of my heart, I‚Äôm betting on the blood! Will **Sir Randy** keep his trophy, or will the rebels burn it all down? Let‚Äôs play Trollball! üî•üèà
postGame: # üèÜ THE OAK STANDS FIRM! OAK & ONSLAUGHT ARE THE CHAMPIONS! üèÜ  Holy Mackerel, sports fans! You are listening to the sweet, gravelly voice of Nok the Corrupter, and my demonic heart is practically singing after that display of sheer, unadulterated violence! In a match that defined the word 'carnage,' **Oak & Onslaught** have claimed the title with a 4-2 victory over the New Monteforte Chaos Creatures! The series ends 3-2, and the 'heroes' of the realm have their crown! üèüÔ∏è‚ú®  The match kicked off with a frantic scramble as **Placido Kora** snatched the troll head, but the Chaos Creatures' early momentum was as shaky as a rogue's promise! **Wolbrom Ariella** and **Urata Oriana** couldn't keep a handle on the ball, dropping it like it was a hot coal from a hellfire forge! It was a comedy of errors that had the rowdy crowd screaming for more gravy! üèà  The first real boom came when **Teria Ravo** decided **Tucker Hett** didn't need to be upright anymore! Teria delivered a tackle that sounded like a dry branch snapping under a giant's boot! Tucker was hauled off to the healers‚Äîa beautiful, bone-crunching highlight that set the tone for the Warden's defense! üöëüí•  Oak & Onslaught finally drew blood on the scoreboard when **Abner Seidel**, likely fueled by those garish undergarments of his, found his range from Center Field! He launched a prayer that sailed through the hoop for a massive **2-point Shoot**! Sir Randy must be polishing his fancy bow in pride while the Monteforte rebels started looking like they‚Äôd just been told they had to pay taxes! üéØ  The second half saw some incredible interceptions! **Symer Crissy** threw a pass that **Wolbrom Ariella** snatched right out of the air, but the Chaos Creatures couldn't capitalize. Then, **Fogel Raynold** tried a wild one that **Teria Ravo** intercepted right back! It was a regular game of 'keep away' with the added bonus of potential skull fractures! üèÄ‚ú®  The Wardens put the nail in the coffin just before the break! **Ema Ulrick** found herself in the Home 2-Point zone and didn't hesitate. She launched another long-range bomb‚ÄîSWISH‚Äîputting the Oak up 4-0! The 'heroes' were putting on a clinic, leaving the Creatures in the dirt and the fans doubling down at the open bar! üò±  Halftime hit, and let me tell you, the medical staff was busier than a one-armed wallpaper hanger! **Ahron Latashia** and **Lian Denton** were stitching limbs back on while the fans were so pickled they were trying to tackle the moving trees! The **Open Bar** has turned the bleachers into a literal sea of swaying, shouting rangers! üç∫üè•  The second half saw the Chaos Creatures find a spark of life! **Urata Oriana**, fresh from his pre-game weapon-testing, found a gap in the defense and launched a beautiful **2-point Shoot**! It cut the lead to 4-2 and for a fleeting moment, the rebellion looked alive! But the Wardens are as immovable as an old oak tree when the title is on the line! üéØü§ò  The brutality reached a fever pitch late in the game! **Normi Glaudia**, despite the boots being on the wrong feet, absolutely demolished **Wolbrom Ariella**! Wolbrom was sent to the infirmary with a crunch that echoed off the Warden‚Äôs Watch! I haven't seen someone hit the turf that hard since I was set free from my prison! üè•üî®  Then **Ema Ulrick** decided to finish what she started, leveling **Raouf Dragone** and sending them straight to the healers! The Chaos Creatures were dropping like flies in a plague-house! If this is what 'heroism' looks like, I‚Äôll take the rebels any day‚Äîat least they have better gravy! üöëüí•  In the final moments, the Wardens played a game of keep-away that would make **Falric** proud. Chaos tried to rally, but **Teria Ravo** and **Affra Yanaton** were walls of steel. When the final whistle blew, the scoreboard read 4-2. The "heroes" have won the series and the championship, proving that popularity and fancy weapons actually count for something! üèÜ  What a season, Osterra! **Sir Randy**‚Äôs rangers are going to be celebrating with ritual sangria for a month! The Chaos Creatures gave us a bracket reset for the history books, but tonight, the Oak stands tall! This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off from the most beautiful bloodbath in the realm! Stay violent, sports fans! üî•ü§ò
